# Execute CL-Eigenwords
```{r}
paths.corpus <- list(es = list(parallel    = "./../data/europarl/europarl-v7.es-en.es.tokenized.10000.parallel",
                               monolingual = "./../data/europarl/europarl-v7.es-en.es.tokenized.10000.monolingual"),
                     en = list(parallel    = "./../data/europarl/europarl-v7.es-en.en.tokenized.10000.parallel",
                               monolingual = "./../data/europarl/europarl-v7.es-en.en.tokenized.10000.monolingual"))

r <- CLEigenwords(paths.corpus, sizes.vocabulary = c(1000, 1000),
                  dim.common = 40,
                  sizes.window = c(2, 2), aliases.languages=c("es", "en"),
                  plot = TRUE,
                  weighting_tf = FALSE,
                  weight.vsdoc = 1e6 * c(1.0, 1.0))

save(r, file = "res_cleigenwords.Rdata")
```


```{r}
p <- r$svd$p_head_domains
print(p)

V1 <- r$svd$V[p[1]:p[2], ]
V2 <- r$svd$V[(p[3]+1):p[4], ]
vocab.words1 <- paste0("(es)", r$vocab.words[[1]])
vocab.words2 <- paste0("(en)", r$vocab.words[[2]])

V <- rbind(V1, V2)
vocab.words <- c(vocab.words1, vocab.words2)
```

## Example of vector representation
```{r}
row.sample <- c(p[1], p[2]+1, p[3]+1, p[4]+1, p[5]+1)
r$svd$V[row.sample, 1:20]
```

## biplot
```{r}
queries <- c(paste0("(en)", c("i", "you", "he", "she", "my", "your", "her", "we")),
             paste0("(es)", c("yo", "tu", "Ã©l", "ella", "mi", "su", "nosotros")))
n.queries <- length(queries)

print(queries[queries %in% vocab.words])

VV <- V
row.names(VV) <- vocab.words
pr.v2 <- prcomp(VV[queries[queries %in% vocab.words],])
plot(pr.v2$x[ , 1:2], pch = 1, col = "grey")
text(pr.v2$x[ , 1], pr.v2$x[ , 2], row.names(pr.v2$x))
```

# Example of lexical translation task
(en)I = (es)yo

```{r}
MostSimilar(V, vocab.words, positive=c("(en)we"), distance = "cosine", language.search = "en")
MostSimilar(V, vocab.words, positive=c("(en)we"), distance = "cosine", language.search = "es")
MostSimilar(V, vocab.words, positive=c("(es)yo"), distance = "cosine", language.search = "en")
MostSimilar(V, vocab.words, positive=c("(es)yo"), distance = "cosine", language.search = "es")
MostSimilar(V, vocab.words, positive=c("(en)him", "(es)yo"), negative=c("(en)he"), distance = "cosine")
```

# Execute some (monolingual) tasks for vector representation of english words
```{r}
V.en <- r$svd$V[(p[3]+1):p[4], ]
vocab.en <- r$vocab.words[[2]]

TestGoogleTasks(V.en, vocab.en, n.cores = 12)
TestWordsim353(V.en, vocab.en)
```
